title: Completed PE Summary - Supidana/ OrientQ
raw_html:
Vessel name Orient
Category Fishing
Registered Owner & Manager: Mr M Visholm
Port of registry: Padstow
Flag: UK
Type: Fishing Vessel
Built: 1988
Length overall: 8.4
Gross tonnage: 5.66
Date & Time 03/05/04 05:16
Location of incident: English coastal waters
Incident Type: Collision
Persons onboard: 1 crew
Injuries/ fatalities: None
Damage/ Pollution: Minor Damage/No Pollution

Vessel name Supidana
Category Merchant
Registered Owner & Manager: Jorn Moller Skibsagentur ApS
Port of registry: Korsor
Flag: Denmark
Type: Dry cargo
Built: 1969
Length overall: 64.62
Gross tonnage: 1109.00
Date & Time 03/05/04
Location of incident: English coastal waters
Incident Type: Collision
Injuries/ fatalities: None
Damage/ Pollution: None

Synopsis

Collision between Danish flag cv Supidana and fv Orient.

Action taken:

The Chief Inspector of Marine Accidents has made recommendations to the owner/skipper of both vessels with reference to:

  • Compliance with the International collision regulations

  • Lookout fatigue

  • The use of lifesaving appliances

  • Crew training

  • Bridge manning
